analysis.description:
PiggyBank._takeProfit (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#464-478) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _beneficiary.transfer(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#474-475)

Reentrancy in PiggyBank._takeProfit (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#464-478):
	External calls:
	- tokens = token.balanceOf(_beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#465-466)
	- token.burn(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#469-474)
	- _updatePrice() (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#475)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _beneficiary.transfer(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#474-475)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rate (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#475)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol:
	Contract PiggyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#372-375)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in PiggyBank._updatePrice (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#478-485):
	External calls:
	- token.totalSupply() > 0 (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#479-485)
	- rate = myAddress.balance.mul(1000000000000000000).div(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#479-484)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rate (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#479-484)

PiggyBank._takeProfit (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#464-478) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.burn(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#469-474)

PiggyBank._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#489-495) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#494-495)
PiggyToken.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x3700eaf34f653553b724ff9d02bb45de9e733b37.sol#312-313)
